channel.title: Registration
channel.description:
I'm not 100% sure if this is the correct section, just tell me and I'll fix it if it is.
Does anybody know a guide so you have to register on my forums, to be able to log in my server? I didn't just what to search in the search bar for that.
Anyway, thanks.

item.title: Registration
item.dc:creator: @The_Dude_D The Dude :D
item.description:
@The_Dude_D wrote:

pasta186:

what type of forums are you using?Maybe post it on the forums of your forum provider?E.g. If your using smfforfree.com,go to the support forum and ask about there?

I am using SMF, but, I’m not using that. I have my own webhost.

Read full topic
